'''Lamond''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A Principi captain, Lamond recently landed a stint as an indentured worker in the Fort Deadlight forge, after clocking [Benweth](/benweth/)'s first mate in a fight. Now he's working a forge - something he has no idea how to do -  until Aeldys gets back and puts Brutal Ben in his place.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [Blow the Man Down](/blowTheManDown/)
|none            = 
|other           =
* He gives you [Deadlight's Storage Key](/deadlightsStorageKey/).
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Blow the Man Down](/blowTheManDown/): Lamond offers an alternative way to solve the quest.

[Category:Fort Deadlight characters](/categoryFortDeadlightCharacters/)

'''Lamond''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
A Principi captain, Lamond recently landed a stint as an indentured worker in the Fort Deadlight forge, after clocking [[Benweth]]'s first mate in a fight. Now he's working a forge - something he has no idea how to do -  until Aeldys gets back and puts Brutal Ben in his place.
